Sources: World Health Organization, John Hopkins school of Medicine, Covid19IndiaOrg, Bing and WorldMeter.
Were you at home today all day?
This app fetches data from various data sources and thus information reflected here may differ from other sources.\n\nWE STAND WITH EVERYONE FIGHTING ON THE FRONTLINES!
\"Don\'t Hoard groceries and essentials. Please ensure that people who are in need don\'t face a shortage because of you! \"
\"Plan ahead! Take a minute and check how much you have at home. Planning ahead let\'s you buy exactly what you need! \"
Plan and calculate your essential needs for the next three weeks and get only what is bare minimum needed.
Be compassionate! Help those in need like the elderly and poor. They are facing a crisis you cannot even imagine!
Going out to buy essentials? Social Distancing is KEY! Maintain 2 metres distance between each other in the line.
Lockdown means LOCKDOWN! Avoid going out unless absolutely necessary. Stay safe!
Stand Against FAKE News and WhatsApp Forwards! Do NOT forward a message until you verify the content it contains.
\"Help out your workers and domestic workers by not cutting their salaries. Show the true Indian spirit! \"
Panic mode : OFF! ESSENTIALS ARE ON!
Be considerate : While buying essentials remember : You need to share with 130 Crore Others!
\"If you have symptoms and suspect you have coronavirus - reach out to your doctor or call state helplines. Get help. \"
The Information you are about to see contains toll of death(s) and people suffering from Coronavirus which might not be suitable for some audiences.\nProceed with Care
Downloading the Update file requires access to the phone storage. Kindly grant the Permission to Proceed
We know this isn\'t the convinient way to update, but as of now this is the only way
Put Device to Landscape for more details
Shortcut opening the Indian Covid Dashboard
Picture in Picture Mode Has Moved!\nTap Home button to Get into PiP Mode
